api_list.name: Get single publication source
api_list.description: Get a single publication of news.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-content.p.rapidapi.com/sports/cbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-content.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-content.p.rapidapi.com/sports/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-content.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET all sports
api_list.description: returns all sports news content from all publications.
